text:
María de la Encarnación Paso Ramos (25 March 1931 – 18 August 2019), better known as Encarna Paso, was a Spanish actress. She was born in Madrid. She was known for her role as Elena in the movie "Begin the Beguine" (1982).
Paso died on 18 August 2019 in Madrid at the age of 88 from pneumonia.
